QuestData.Title: Time to Hide
QuestData.Description: You shouldn't have touched it. But now that you did, he's going to come looking for you.$B$BAnd he'll find you. Unless you hide yourself from him.$B$BBring me blood from the faceless ones if you want to live!
QuestData.LogDescription: Matthias Lehner wants you to obtain 3 Faceless One's Blood.
QuestData.RewardText: What are you waiting for? You have to rub it on you!$B$BQuick! Or he'll see you!
